actions.name: Watery Grasp
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage  and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). While grappling a creature this way  the naiad can't use Watery Grasp on a different target and can swim at full speed.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The naiad has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Speak with Nature
special_abilities.desc: The naiad can communicate with beasts and plants.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The naiad can breathe air and water.
